sen.j: 六角満綱（ろっかくみつつな、応永8年（1401年） - 文安2年1月23日 (旧暦)（1445年3月1日））は、南北朝時代 (日本)、室町時代の武士。
sen.e: Mitsutsuna ROKKAKU (1401 - March 1, 1445) was a samurai (warrior) who lived in the Nanbokucho Period (Southern and Northern Court Period) and Muromachi Period.

sen.j: 妻が足利義満の娘であることから足利義教の信任を受け、その援助を背景に比叡山と対立したが、嘉吉の乱で義教が暗殺されると後ろ盾を失って領内は混乱した。
sen.e: As his wife was a daughter of Yoshimitsu ASHIKAGA, he won Yoshinori ASHIKAGA's trust and, based on the support by Yoshinori, confronted with Mr. Hiei, but as Yoshinori was assassinated in the Kakitsu War, his fief was confused because of lack of the support.

sen.j: 将軍の側近として早くから活動していたため、家督は嫡男の持綱に譲っていたが、1445年、反対勢力に擁立された子の時綱によって持綱と共に滅ぼされ自刃した。
sen.e: As he had been working from the early stage as a close aide to the shogun, he had handed over the position of the family head to this heir, Mochitsuna, and, in 1445, he was overthrown together with Mochitsuna by his son, Tokitsuna, who was supported by the opponent and committed a suicide with a sword.
